title: Saline (medicine)
summary: Saline (also known as saline solution) is a mixture of sodium chloride (salt) and water and has a number of uses in medicine.[1] Applied to the affected area it is used to clean wounds, help remove contact lenses, and help with dry eyes.[2] By injection into a vein it is used to treat dehydration such as from gastroenteritis and diabetic ketoacidosis.[2][1]
